array.title: Where's the Shuttle?
description: Where's the Shuttle is a web application that allows William Paterson University students track the current location of all four campus shuttle buses.

array.title: Online Portfolio
description: This page! A responsive website built with ReactJS. The site's content is passed in as JSON data, which generates auto-generating components for easy maintenance.  I have seen various personal portfolio websites throughout the years. When I set out to create my very own personal porfolio, there were three goals that I wanted:
